amendment.description: Amendment requires local education agencies to develop agreements with Head Start and other agencies to carry out early childhood education activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to require LEAs to develop agreements with Head Start and other agencies to carry out early childhood education activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
